64.eng-name: Military Expeditions led by the Prophet (pbuh) (Al-Maghaazi)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ash Shabi:An Nu`man bin Bashir said, "Abdullah bin Rawaha fell down unconscious.." (and mentioned the above Hadith adding, "Thereupon, when he died she (i.e. his sister) did not weep over him

chapter.ara-name: باب غَزْوَةُ مُوتَةَ مِنْ أَرْضِ الشَّأْمِ
chapter.eng-name: The expedition of Mu`tah to the land of Syria
